channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed

item.title: After nearly 10 years, Twist Bioscience spin-off plans Terabyte-scale DNA storage in 2026, intending to store 13TB of data in a 'single drop of water.'
item.description: Atlas Data Storage plans terabyte-scale DNA storage by 2026, aiming to store massive data in tiny, highly dense volumes.

item.title: Trump’s Crusade Against ‘Woke’ Climate Research Threatens Solar Science
item.description: The National Center for Atmospheric Research not only investigates weather on Earth, but also in space.

item.title: No Avian Will Escape This 360-Camera Bird Feeder
item.description: Why miss a single second of your local birds' feeding frenzy?

item.title: ‘The Last of Us’ Season 3 Is Recasting an ‘Avengers’ Actor
item.description: Marvel's new Falcon, Danny Ramirez, will not be returning for season 3 of the HBO show.

item.title: Elizabeth Warren Finally Used ChatGPT
item.description: Many are dropping their skepticism. Bernie Sanders isn't.

item.title: CES 2026 — What to expect
item.description: CES 2026 will be big, busy, and full of AI but with incremental updates across many, many tech categories.

item.title: Dyson has just released a vacuum that doesn't make any sense – here are 6 baffling questions about the PencilVac, answered

item.title: CD Projekt Co-Founder Buys Steam Rival GOG
Apple AirTag four-packs are on sale for $65 right now
item.description:
Apple keeps most of its product pricing on a tight leash, but we do see the company's AirTags go on sale pretty frequently. Another cost cut has come around for this item just in time for the new year. Amazon is currently selling a four-pack of AirTags for $65. At a third off the regular cost, that price is pretty close to the record low discount of $63 we've seen for these Bluetooth trackers.
AirTags can be useful for people who travel frequently, helping you to keep track of essentials like your passport as well as a way to keep tabs on luggage while you're on the go. If you do purchase so...

item.title: Opioid Abuse in Pregnancy Surged in Recent Decades, Study Finds
item.description: Pregnant women who reported opioid use disorder were more likely to face serious health complications, as were their children.

item.title: World's fastest mini PC doesn't run Windows 11 — $2,899 gets you a Core Ultra 9 CPU, 96GB of RAM, RTX 5090M, 2TB SSD, and yes, it is all about AI
item.description: The Olares One mini PC delivers desktop-grade components, substantial RAM, a high-end GPU, and SSD storage, emphasizing AI workloads and local processing.

item.title: Your Beloved Hockey Homosexuals Are Dipping Their Toes Into Romantasy
item.description: 'Heated Rivalry' breakouts Connor Storrie and Hudson Williams star in an erotic audio tale in which they play fae princes.
